We've been through several reinventions

128.27.text:
most significant moments came in
about 2000. Before that, we

133.39.text:
were in denial that we were a presentation

136.07.text:

148.56.text:

152.02.text:

155.21.text:
just that one thing. I made a very
counterintuitive move and

159.04.text:

162.15.text:

200.78.text:

208.67.text:
